sub_title: Acoustics and Sonar Scientist TNO | PhD in Geophyiscs
summary: During my studies I have always enjoyed the multidisciplinary aspects of geoscience. Being at the forefront of new technologies has allowed me to explore the subsurface on a new level of high detail. After several years of fundamental research I am now moving for a versatile working environment in applied research on acoustics and sonar, wherein I can combine my knowledge in signal processing, wave propagation and inversion with programming skills to provide creative solutions to new problems.

As PhD candidate in the Section of Applied Geophysics, I was involved in research, teaching, supervision & organisation of events for staff and students. The goal of the 4 year project is to use the novel Marchenko method to detect small time-lapse changes in subsurface reservoirs (e.g. fluid flow). The Marchenko method allows to redatum the seimsic wavefield measured at the surface of the earth to a new focal depth in the subsurface, effectively removing undesirable effects (multiples) of the overlying layers.
In this position I attended a number of discipline related courses and summer schools:
   - Introduction to High Performance Computing (2022)
   - Utilizing unstructured data in geoscience (2021)
   - Wave propagation and control in complex media (2021)
   - Research Data Management (2020)
   - Multiscale modeling and simulation: scalable simulation of nonlinear processes in heterogeneous fractured porous media (2020)
   - Advanced wave theory for geoscientist (2019)
   - Programming with MPI (2019)
    - Introduction to transport in porous media with application in reservoir engineering and geo-environmental engineering (2019)
I also taught lectures and tutorials to BSc. and MSc. students in the following subjects:
  - Geophysical Methods for Subsurface Characterisation
  - Advanced Reflection Seismology and Seismic Imaging
  - Geophysics Special Subjects', 'title': 'PHD Candidate', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3614, 'name': 'TNO', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQFobKDECbgbEQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1688455653450/tno_logo?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=t65L5S7Gg1W136RpAMZpxJ1me2-CXJtbG2xvg7LBkt8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/tno/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'TNO', 'description': 'Internship and Master Thesis Project:
